name: debounce_input
docstring:
The DebounceInput component is used to buffer input events on the client side.

    It is intended to wrap various form controls and should be used whenever a
    fully-controlled input is needed to prevent lost input data when the backend
    is experiencing high latency.

properties.name: min_length
properties.description: Minimum input characters before triggering the on_change event

properties.name: debounce_timeout
properties.description: Time to wait between end of input and triggering on_change

properties.name: force_notify_by_enter
properties.description: If true, notify when Enter key is pressed

properties.name: force_notify_on_blur
properties.description: If true, notify when form control loses focus

properties.name: value
properties.description: If provided, create a fully-controlled input

properties.name: input_ref
properties.description: The ref to attach to the created input
